snippet: The head of the nation's biggest car dealership chain says it won't sell used cars being recalled for exploding air bags due to conflicting advice from automakers and lack of direction from the government....

headline.print_headline: AutoNation Halts Sales of Cars in Air Bag Recalls
headline.main: AutoNation Halts Sales of Cars in Air Bag Recalls

lead_paragraph: The head of the nation's biggest car dealership chain says it won't sell used cars being recalled for exploding air bags due to conflicting advice from automakers and lack of direction from the government.
